title: I am now a Dark Harvest midlaner.
body:
With the recent changes to mages and the plan to utterly gut the Sorcery rune tree that benefits them, i have been looking into alternatives to shy away from the Sorc tree and recently found it in the domination tree.

I tried electrocute, its good, I will grant it that, its very strong early an offers a powerful tool for 1v1 laning phases for those with good rotations, so its an alternative.

But then I tried Dark Harvest, on {{champion:1}} anyway, and holy hell is this rune friggin strong. I don't think i ever snowballed so hard that game as i did with Dark Harvest, you might think its a late game rune and it is but honestly, its early game power is really strong to! Getting 4 souls from both sides of canon minions gave me a good chunk of stacks and damage, coupled with starting {{item:1082}}+{{item:2031}} ((Becuase {{item:1056}} is one of the worst items in the game now)) and a farm heavy lane and I was dealing insane damage by the time mid game came along and I honestly hadn't got that ahead in kills or CS.

With the Sorc tree set to become garbage, i will now use it as a secondary tree only, for midlaners looking for an alternative i implore you try Dark Harvest, farm passively till mid game, get those canon souls from both teams and you'll see that incredible difference it makes. Unless Riot fixes the Sorc tree i won't be going back to it. ever.

replies.body:
I would say Dring isn't as strong on Annie as it used to be since some of it's power was shifted into aa damage to minions, and Annie tends to use Q to farm due to the mana/CD refund on kill.

Definitely not a bad item by any means though.
If you think that is silly, try it in ARAM.

honestly, I bring it as anyone and on a nami game where I built full support items excluding sorcery boots (bc why not get the bonus damage on harvest) and got most damage in the end out of both teams. Yeah, nobody else brought dark harvest that game and carries who built full dmg did less
Sorc tree is fine lmao. Champs like Annie never ran it to begin with. As far as DH mid goes, you're half a year behind ARAM kek

Dark Harvest imo is much more geared towards Trinity Force/Lich Bane users. I am a dark harvest mid laner myself(although now I'm beginning to use electrocute occasionally because Dark Harvest started to feel boring. I get to build tankier and the play pattern is kind of easier for me, plus I do less damage with my abilities from building more durability. Also the sorcery tree isn't bad at all. I do hate the idea of nimbus cloak and moving Ultimate Hat over to the domination tree(such an annoying thing, since taking it on Kat would reduce my healing due to no longer have ravenous hunter), manaflow band, scorch, Absolute Focus, Waterwalking, and Comet are all really good runes though, so I don't see why people are claiming the sorcery tree sucks. It and Domination are my two favorite rune trees. Although I do like Inspiration quite a bit as well since I'm an assassin and my job is to get ahead early.

Dark harvest turns everything into a lichbane/trinityforce user.
